definition: to place upside down/to invert/to pour/to throw out/to move backwards/however/actually/as a matter of fact/contrary to expectation
to fall/to collapse/to lie horizontally/to overthrow/to fail/to go bankrupt/to change (trains or buses)/to move around/to resell at a profit
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I just need some place where I can lay my head.
sentences.chinese: 只想找个地方我可以倒头就睡。

sentences.english: I was too tired to think about it more so I just glanced at it and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 一路累乏，懒得多想，只看了它一眼，倒头便睡。

sentences.english: Some people can drink an espresso with dinner and fall asleep with no problem.
sentences.chinese: 有的人可以在餐中饮用特浓咖啡而后倒头便睡。

sentences.english: One overslept himself then there were eight.
sentences.chinese: 倒头一睡睡死啦，九个只剩八。

sentences.english: We conked out right after the last guests took their leave.
sentences.chinese: 最后一批客人一走，我们就累得倒头睡去。

sentences.english: She went out like a light after an exhausting day at work.
sentences.chinese: 一天辛苦的工作之后，她筋疲力尽，倒头就睡着了。

sentences.english: Maybe I was too tired, so back to the hotel will fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 也许我太累了，所以回到宾馆便倒头就睡。

sentences.english: I was too exhausted to take easily when once asleep.
sentences.chinese: 我太累了，只要倒头一睡就很难醒过来了。

definition: to lie down to sleep with one's clothes on
